item.title: Deep Learning for Medicine and Healthcare
item.description: Deep Learning for Medicine and Healthcare Deepmed Website What’s Deepmed? DeepMed is a deep learning framework for Medicine and Healthcare written in Python and it uses PyTorch as the backend engine ðŸš€. Why this Project? The mission of this project is to make the power of state of the art deep learning models for medicine and healthcare available to anyone working in this area to build a better future of healthcare together.
